org.nvonop.selenium.framework

Class Browser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nvonop.selenium.framework.Browser

  • public class Browser
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the base functionality for instantiating a thread safe web browser for a test. Tests should be able to run in parallel with no issues.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.ThreadLocal<org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver> driver
      A ThreadLocal instance of a WebDriver object.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Browser()

      This method closes the browser associated with the ThreadLocal WebDriver object.

      This method gets the current page source and returns as a String

      This method gets the current page title and returns as a String
      void getScreenshot()
      This method takes a screenshot and saves it in the location specified in the system property "TEST_RESULTS_PATH".

      This method takes a screenshot and saves it in the location specified by "path".

      This method allows focus to switch to an alert

      This method allows focus to switch to a different frame within a web page.

      This method allows the test to switch focus to a browser window with the title of "windowTitle".

    • Field Detail

      • driver

        protected java.lang.ThreadLocal<org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver> driver
        A ThreadLocal instance of a WebDriver object. It should be thread safe and enable tests to run in parallel.

      • close

        public void close()
        This method closes the browser associated with the ThreadLocal WebDriver object. It also the WebDriver instance for the ThreadLocal value to null.
